short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Beautiful email eCards accessible directly from Gmail.
short.de: Wunderschöne E-Mail-E-Cards direkt über Gmail zugänglich
short.es: Tarjetas electrónicas de correo bellas accesibles directamente desde Gmail.
short.fr: Belles cartes électroniques accessibles directement depuis Gmail.
short.it: Bellissime eCard via email accessibili direttamente da Gmail.
short.ja: Gmailから直接アクセスできる美しいメールeカード。
short.nl: Prachtige e-mail eCards direct toegankelijk vanuit Gmail.
short.pl: Piękne e-kartki dostępne bezpośrednio z Gmaila.
short.pt_BR: Belos eCards de email acessíveis diretamente do Gmail.
short.pt_PT: Belos cartões eletrônicos de email acessíveis diretamente do Gmail.
short.zh_CN: 直接从Gmail访问的精美电子邮件电子贺卡。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Most eCard senders are saddened to find out that their eCards are often never even opened by the recipient. 

Too often, ecards are found in spam folders with gibberish subject titles, where email recipients have to open their email only to find an access code to view their eCard on other website. 

We think that system is broken. So we fixed it. 

With Free Gmail eCards by cloudHQ, your email recipient won't need to go to any other website to claim their eCard, and it won't get lost in their spam folder, either. 

You'll be able to create your ecard directly within Gmail, and your ecard recipient will be able to receive it right within their email too—where their email can be any email address, not just Gmail. 

Here is how it works:

1. Install the extension
2. Open your Gmail and start composing an email 
3. Select your eCard
4. Edit the message
5. Hit Send!

Special Features:
✔️ No third party website to visit—works right within Gmail
✔️ Cute GIFs in your eCards
✔️ 100s of eCards for every occasion, every event, and every holiday
✔️ New eCards added every week
✔️ Express emotions on world events, holidays and occasions
✔️ Best eCard system to actually get received! 

cloudHQ. Helping your productivity, 1 click at a time.

NOTE: To access your settings or install additional cloudHQ apps, click on the cloudHQ icon located in the upper right corner of your Gmail inbox.

cloudHQ website: https://www.cloudhq.net/
App website: https://www.gmail-ecards.com/
Pricing: FREE
Support page: https://support.cloudhq.net/category/browser-extensions/gmail-ecards/
Blog: https://blog.cloudhq.net
Demo: https://www.cloudhq.net/demo

Google Workspace, Google Sheets, Google Drive, Google Alerts and Gmail are trademarks of Google LLC. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.
